name: Flood World
description:
Flood World invites players to explore a dynamic generated sandbox world.

  • THRILL! Is not a feature promised by this game. Really, relax and explore.
  • FISH! You'll need to find them and sticks or the game will end. It's not hard though.
  • CYCLE! The world goes through cycles of flooding and droughts. It's fun to watch.

See how you fare in... Flood World!

Instructions: Move with the arrow keys or w, a, s, d. Dig sand with space and dump sand with left shift.
